Package marytts.language.de.preprocess

Internals of the preprocessing module.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbbrevEP An expansion pattern implementation for abbreviation patterns.
CompositeEP An expansion pattern implementation for composite patterns.
CurrencyEP An expansion pattern implementation for currency patterns.
DateEP An expansion pattern implementation for date patterns.
DurationEP An expansion pattern implementation for duration patterns.
ExpansionPattern For preprocessing, serve as a base class for the different types of possible expansion patterns.
MeasureEP An expansion pattern implementation for measure patterns.
MultiWordEP An expansion pattern implementation for abbreviation patterns.
NetEP An expansion pattern implementation for internet (URI or email) patterns.
NumberEP An expansion pattern implementation for basic number patterns.
SpecialCharEP An expansion pattern implementation for specialChar patterns.
TelephoneEP An expansion pattern implementation for telephone number patterns.
TimeEP An expansion pattern implementation for time patterns.
 

Package marytts.language.de.preprocess Description
